plot: Three weeks after the earthquake that shook Chile on February 27, 2010, the filmmaker takes an in-depth glimpse of the affected areas.
title: Tres semanas después
plot_es: Three weeks after the earthquake that shook Chile on February 27, 2010, the filmmaker takes an in-depth glimpse of the affected areas.
plot_en: Three weeks after the earthquake that shook Chile on February 27, 2010, the filmmaker takes an in-depth glimpse of the affected areas.
